content.rendered:
Tailor, Migrate & Stay On-Demand
with AWS Managed Services

TechProComp optimizes, augments & operates innovative secure AWS managed solutions to scale & rise with agility in your business

Schedule a free consultation

Next-Generation AWS MSP Solutions:
Tailored Success with Mobilise Cloud

Unlock the power of AWS: seamlessly navigate, securely scale, and achieve success with our expert aws consulting services

Setting up or scaling applications and workloads on Amazon Web Services requires a steep learning curve. That challenge continues as AWS releases hundreds of new services with a myriad of possible applications and configurations each year. While cloud security and compliance remain a top concern, the most common issues can be addressed with proper account configuration, configuration best practices and automation.

Our certified AWS consultants work with customers to help them start from a secure foundation, integrate the latest cloud-native and third-party services and learn how to use their platform to achieve their vision of the agile enterprise. By working together through our unique methodology, we help you gain valuable skills and adopt lean, agile DevOps principles on AWS.

Our Premium AWS

Managed Services Scope

AWS Data and Analytics

Making an investment in analytics and AI capabilities is critical for a data-driven enterprise. Our AWS-certified data and analytics consultants can help you at every step of your journey.

AWS Data and Analytics

Making an investment in analytics and AI capabilities is critical for a data-driven enterprise. Our AWS-certified data and analytics consultants can help you at every step of your journey.

AWS DevOps Practice

Establish a scalable DevOps foundation to accelerate innovation, using comprehensive analysis and optimized frameworks to ensure practices and psychology are built into the business foundation.

AWS DevOps Practice

Establish a scalable DevOps foundation to accelerate innovation, using comprehensive analysis and optimized frameworks to ensure practices and psychology are built into the business foundation.

AWS Financial Services & Insurance Practice

Plan, implement, manage and secure your cloud environment through tailored solutions that drive innovation and agility.

AWS Financial Services & Insurance Practice

Plan, implement, manage and secure your cloud environment through tailored solutions that drive innovation and agility.

AWS for Government

TechProComp is a Migration Acceleration Program partner with AWS, empowering digital government and the public sector of the future.

AWS for Government

TechProComp is a Migration Acceleration Program partner with AWS, empowering digital government and the public sector of the future.

AWS Mainframe Modernization Practice

Adopt the best modernization approach for your workloads to optimize IT infrastructure costs and protect the migration process from risk.

AWS Mainframe Modernization Practice

Adopt the best modernization approach for your workloads to optimize IT infrastructure costs and protect the migration process from risk.

AWS Migration Practice

Design and execute a strategic approach to workload migration and rapidly provision scalable, resilient and secure infrastructure through automation.

AWS Migration Practice

Design and execute a strategic approach to workload migration and rapidly provision scalable, resilient and secure infrastructure through automation.

AWS Managed Services

Manage your AWS environment using a comprehensive combination of ITIL® based methodologies, automation and industry best practices.

AWS Managed Services

Manage your AWS environment using a comprehensive combination of ITIL® based methodologies, automation and industry best practices.

AWS Networking Practice

Leverage our AWS Networking services to address the complexities in designing and managing a secured AWS cloud environment.

AWS Networking Practice

Leverage our AWS Networking services to address the complexities in designing and managing a secured AWS cloud environment.

AWS SaaS Practice

Gain cloud-native SaaS implementation and development support. As an AWS Partner with an AWS SaaS Competency, we have deep experience helping organizations design and build SaaS solutions.

AWS SaaS Practice

Gain cloud-native SaaS implementation and development support. As an AWS Partner with an AWS SaaS Competency, we have deep experience helping organizations design and build SaaS solutions.

Add the top AWS talent to your organization

Whether you’re just getting started in AWS or you need help reaching the next level of cloud maturity, we can help you scale, optimize, and secure your AWS infrastructure.

With AWS solutions from TechProComp

you can have:

Increased service availability

TechProComp design and build services based on the AWS Well Architected Framework, taking advantage of features such as auto-scaling, ensuring critical business systems remain highly available.

Increased service availability

TechProComp design and build services based on the AWS Well Architected Framework, taking advantage of features such as auto-scaling, ensuring critical business systems remain highly available.

Proactive management

TechProComp utilise next generation monitoring capabilities to automatically identify & alert on anomalies. Security tooling such as CloudTrail, Config & GuardDuty ensure a strong security posture and proactive response to events by AWS certified experts.

Proactive management

TechProComp utilise next generation monitoring capabilities to automatically identify & alert on anomalies. Security tooling such as CloudTrail, Config & GuardDuty ensure a strong security posture and proactive response to events by AWS certified experts.

Capacity and cost management

By using Infrastructure as Code, environments can be created when needed and destroyed afterwards, meaning you won’t have to pay for unused infrastructure resources.

Capacity and cost management

By using Infrastructure as Code, environments can be created when needed and destroyed afterwards, meaning you won’t have to pay for unused infrastructure resources.

Predictability of costs

Infrastructure in the cloud means no more maintenance costs and a clear pay as you go pricing model. TechProComp provide proactive cost saving measures to help customers drive down costs – including the use of Spot Instances, Right Sizing and Savings Plans.

Predictability of costs

Infrastructure in the cloud means no more maintenance costs and a clear pay as you go pricing model. TechProComp provide proactive cost saving measures to help customers drive down costs – including the use of Spot Instances, Right Sizing and Savings Plans.

Extendible existing infrastructure

Reduce costs and provide new capabilities to your existing infrastructure with a flexible cloud offering that manages current business requirements and allows for rapid innovation.

Extendible existing infrastructure

Reduce costs and provide new capabilities to your existing infrastructure with a flexible cloud offering that manages current business requirements and allows for rapid innovation.

Scale out your team virtually

With secure access available to your resources from anywhere in the world, scale your teams like never before. Amazon Workspaces & Appstream allow global users to securely access corporate services.

Scale out your team virtually

With secure access available to your resources from anywhere in the world, scale your teams like never before. Amazon Workspaces & Appstream allow global users to securely access corporate services.

TechProComp Operation Center 24/7/365

Schedule a free consultation

Right-Sized for Your

Operational Needs

When it comes to AWS Managed Services, one-size doesn’t fit all. We offer three service level tiers, so that you can pick a plan that is right for your business, adding ad-hoc services as you go. Every plan offers baseline access to Microsoft-certified Azure experts, 24×7 support, and powerful optimization and reporting tools.

Essentials

Our first service tier helps organizations maintain their operations baseline through basic support and event monitoring

Essentials

Our first service tier helps organizations maintain their operations baseline through basic support and event monitoring

Advanced

Our second service tier offers an enhanced level of support including incident resolution and advisory services

Advanced

Our second service tier offers an enhanced level of support including incident resolution and advisory services

Premium

Our highest tier of service provides clients with full operational support and enhancement services

Premium

Our highest tier of service provides clients with full operational support and enhancement services

TechProComp

Areas of Expertise & Solutions

TechProComp is your cloud migration partner, working in tandem with your IT team to ensure a smooth, efficient cloud transition. Since every organization has different needs, we provide enterprise customers two cloud adoption choices for success – Enterprise Integration and Application Migration.

Enterprise Integration provides a way to quickly migrate your workloads to the cloud while remaining secure and compliant; and Application Migration rearchitects your platform and applications to take advantage of the cloud’s scalability, performance and cost benefits.

Combining agile and consultative methodologies, AWS best practices and automated tools, TechProComp helps you implement continuous integration and delivery pipelines and automate infrastructure provisioning and management.

Our custom-built cloud implementation framework, Enterprise Landing Zone, enables you to quickly deploy enterprise workloads using the best automation tools available. This template, which can be customized to fit your needs, offers you a secure, cost-effective, automated AWS environment.

Speed and agility is crucial for successful software and product development, especially when it comes to redesigning your existing monolithic architectures for meeting your business goals. TechProComp’s experts are equipped with knowledge in developing containerized architectures on AWS to accelerate innovation and enable you to become truly cloud-native.

Our security engineers design security at scale and are experienced in creating HIPAA, SOC2, SOX and PCI-DSS compliant solutions while guiding you through the design, setup and audit process. As an AWS Premier Partner focused on establishing a security baseline for customers, TechProComp’s AWS deployment experience includes firewalls, IDS, proxies, IPS, SIEM, VPC design, including multi-VPC design patterns; and multi-region redundancy, infrastructure for secrets management, DDoS Resiliency, building custom applications and guiding and implementing security strategies across multiple AWS accounts.

AWS provides numerous options when it comes to types, sizes and payment plans for cloud resources. Understanding your environment and navigating the endless possibilities it poses is key to cost-efficient success in the cloud.

TechProComp’s Cost Management and Optimization program is designed to meet these challenges by maximizing financial visibility and optimizing your AWS architecture to reduce cloud costs and ensure smart growth in the cloud.

The AWS Marketplace is a digital catalog where AWS customers can find, purchase, deploy, and manage third-party software and services to build robust cloud solutions and scale their businesses. AWS Marketplace includes thousands of listings from popular categories such as security, cloud management, data, and machine learning.

As an AWS Marketplace Skilled Consulting Partner (MSCP), TechProComp has extensive experience helping customers navigate and adopt innovative solutions and services from the marketplace. In addition, TechProComp works with AWS ISV Partners to offer a customized, seamless, and cost-effective experience for our mutual customers.

TechProComp’s Solutions Factory is an ever-growing collection of fully-automated, ready-to-deploy AWS CloudFormation architecture blueprints, offered as part of TechProComp’s Cost Management and Optimization program to expedite your adoption and expansion of AWS.

TechProComp gives organizations a secure, automated solution for moving workloads to the cloud. Quickly and easily launch new environments with TechProComp’s Next-Generation Landing Zone—the fully automated, enterprise-scale solution that implements AWS best practices.

TechProComp’s Managed Security Service Provider (MSSP) offering is designed to meet the baseline standard of quality for managed AWS security, ensuring our customer’s perimeter is properly designed, configured, maintained and monitored.

TechProComp Engage enables faster support, streamlined operations and an improved AWS experience via a single, personalized point of contact. Our unique outcomes-based approach ensures customers receive added value from every engagement, with full transparency.

TechProComp helps ISVs leverage the power of AWS to transform their business to a subscription-based billing model and to start selling on the AWS Marketplace. Transforming to a SaaS model atop AWS makes it easier for customers to buy and access your software, expanding business and creating new and continuous revenue flows. The speed of development and ability to fully secure customer data are additional technological benefits a SaaS application provides.

Customer obsession is at the heart of everything we do. Our team takes a value-based approach to data and analytics, which helps you turn your data into a strategic asset to achieve critical business outcomes of improved profits, increased revenues and competitive advantages.

The AWS Cloud offers small and medium-sized businesses a way to try new ideas, experiment with technology, and accelerate the innovation cycle. TechProComp works with SMBs unique needs by combining deep expertise, extensive reach and custom solutions. Our AWS experts ensure your organization has a plan for today and a strategy for the future, while remaining on the cutting edge of innovation.

TESTIMONIAL

What our customers say

The quality of the work was outstanding, especially compared to the pricing and service we received from other firms.

Thomson Patent Law

I switched my services to Slobo and his team at Techprocomp Managed Services; Slobo had told me about the unknown and why their back up and monitoring was a no brainer for any business owner. Well, last week, my emails and folders disappeared; 4 years work at risk (and yes, I had back up). Not only did their service team respond urgently to my panic stricken call for help, within 1 day everything was restored – not sure how they did it, but that’s why you definitely need them. Until you have a crisis, you can’t tell how good a service provider is – well, 5* as far as I am concerned, thank you. Their service and skills are exceptional but what I liked was the wise advice when I first met them and it has stood my business in good stead.

James Hulk

American Postal Union

I am the office manager at Daisy Motor Group. We use TechProComp for all of our computer/technology support. Slobo is always willing to help us. As with any business, our issues always seem urgent. He works hard to get to us quickly and resolve our problems. Very trustworthy and knowledgeable. So glad we have Slobo to rely on! I would strongly recommend his services!!

Kristy Smith

Daisy Motor Group

Slobo and his team have been wonderful to work with. When the ice storm hit this February him and his team kept us up to date and kept the project rolling even through the power outages. When working with TechProComp I felt valued and taken care of the entire time. Having a running tracker of the project was really nice to have. Anytime a decision needed to be made, Slobo would present recommendations and give me a pressure free experience while also providing great advice. It is very obvious when working with them that they know what they are doing. They supported our move to a cloud based infrastructure, helping us use more modern technology that saves us money. On top of being a pleasure to work with, their prices were very fair and their estimate gave us an accurate price to keep in mind. We look forward to working with them more in the future!

Lucas Christianson

ProTex Plumbing and Mechanical

I will always highly recommend them for any IT related services, small to extremely complex. Slobo and his team will do whatever it takes (working after hours) to fulfill your needs. Our entire system was set up and monitored by them and during the process they listened to what we wanted and provided feedback explaining how they could best achieve what we wanted. Never a pushy attitude insisting we spend more money on hardware unless it was absolutely necessary. Their prices are more than fair and regardless of that, I have never encountered more timely service and availability to address our IT related needs.

Michael Nickel

Digg Commercial

TechProComp is very professional. Slobo, and his team are really knowledgeable about a wide range of issues. Slobo has really helped us out when other services have become overwhelmed due to the pandemic. Thanks so much!

Kyle McClintock

Thompson Patent Law

Called the service and he was able to come same day and save our data. Business was up and running within the hour. Great service fast and reasonable priced. Would definitely use again.

Emma Kallash

Feniex Industries

Great company for all of your IT services!!!!! Very happy customer!!!!!!

Leah Smith

Best Western Plus Hotel
